name: quiz-app
description: quiz-app-mern/ ├── client/            // Frontend React app │   ├── public/ │   ├── src/ │   │   ├── components/     // React components │   │   ├── pages/          // React pages (e.g., Home, Quiz, Admin) │   │   ├── services/       // API service integration (Axios, Fetch) │   │   ├── App.js          // Main React component │   │   ├── index.js        // Entry point for React app │   │   └── ... │   ├── package.json      // Frontend dependencies and scripts │   └── ... ├── server/            // Backend Node.js server │   ├── models/          // Mongoose models (User, Quiz, Question) │   ├── routes/          // Express routes (API endpoints) │   ├── controllers/     // Logic handling for routes │   ├── config/          // Configuration files (e.g., MongoDB connection) │   ├── app.js           // Entry point for Express server │   ├── package.json     // Backend dependencies and scripts │   └── ... ├── package.json       // Root level package.json for managing both frontend and backend └── README.md          // Project documentation
